entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 3.0°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
